short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlocks APN settings for some b535 Huawei superbox routers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some Huawei B535-232 routers have locked functionality such as APN dialup settings. This extension will help to unlock this functionality and allow to use these routers with different SIM cards.

Extension:
- will unlock "plus" button and enable option to add new APN profiles;
- will unlock "save" button during APN profile creation to allow saving new profiles and editing them.
